parameters.name: Crop width
parameters.help: Desired crop size in pixels, specified as two integers for width (e.g., 300 )

parameters.name: Crop height
parameters.help: Desired crop size in pixels, specified as two integers for height (e.g., 300)

parameters.name: Crop start X
parameters.help: Optional: X coordinate for the top-left corner of the crop box. If not set, cropping is centered horizontally.

parameters.name: Crop start Y
parameters.help: Optional: Y coordinate for the top-left corner of the crop box. If not set, cropping is centered vertically.
